casebody.data:
John Bean, an infant, respondent, v. Joseph P. Reynolds, appellant. Decided April 13, 1885. Appeal from judgment for plaintiff, entered on verdict of a jury. I. T. Williams, for appellant. James E. Kelley, for respondent.

Before O’Gorman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
